About



London-based Finance and Technology startup which designs, scopes and delivers Finance and Risk change.


Please view 'Projects' for examples of MPV solutions for Projects and Financial Services.


Values


Innovation - Passion for technology and how it can improve businesses and lives.


Simplicity - Always search for the most simple solutions to improve understanding and ease-of-use.


Ethical - Approach business with clear ethical principles and engage in disuscussions of Ethics.


Action-oriented - Approach business with clear ethical principles and engage in disuscussions of Ethics.

Founder: Adrian Hough


Finance, Risk and Change experience working in institutions such as Deutsche Bank, RBC Capital and Bank of America.


Delivered projects for Commodities, Structured Finance, Derivatives, Fixed Income and Emerging Markets businesses.


MBA and winner of the 2019 'CFTE Onfido Extrapreneurship' competition and member of CFTE alumni board.

); } export default AboutSection;
